name: Totally Normal First Dates
description:
A stupid promise I made but I bit off more than I could chew.

Game's playable and done BUT NOT FINISHED! Comment for feedback. Not working on this for another while! ENJOY! I FULFILLED MY END OF THE BARGAIN!

CHANGELOG:

1.0: HAPPY VALENTINE'S DAY! FIRST RELEASE! Plans to complete the game with a better engine and dialogue fixes are being made. Art is done but not at a satisfied state.

0.76:Main Menu logic and art done. Actually up to art now.

0.75: Skeleton of the game done. Fixed Changelog. Game is fully playable but not really. Promise is a promise. Valentine's day and no later than that. Promise for real this time.

0.50: Second date is live! Fixed a ton of grammar and spelling. Moved code around to make the game more stable. Fixed a bunch of interactions. Included an end message. Updated some screens. Placeholders are fixed for the full release!!

0.15: DEMO IS LIVE AND FIXED SEVERAL ERRORS.

What's next? Well...

Bug testing -> GET OTHER HUMAN TO PLAY -> Finish the story.
